mkr.ant.taskdefs
Class Ant

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.Ant

public class Ant
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant>

Build a sub-project. 

   <target name="foo" depends="init">
     <ant antfile="build.xml" target="bar" >
       <property name="property1" value="aaaaa" />
       <property name="foo" value="baz" />
     </ant>
   </target>
   <target name="bar" depends="init">
     <echo message="prop is ${property1} ${foo}" />
   </target>

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant)

Method Detail

setInheritAll

public Ant setInheritAll(boolean val)
If true, pass all properties to the new Ant project. Defaults to true.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.setInheritAll)

setInheritRefs

public Ant setInheritRefs(boolean val)
If true, pass all references to the new Ant project. Defaults to false.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.setInheritRefs)

setDir

public Ant setDir(java.io.File val)
The directory to use as a base directory for the new Ant project. Defaults to the current project's basedir, unless inheritall has been set to false, in which case it doesn't have a default value. This will override the basedir setting of the called project.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.setDir)

setAntfile

public Ant setAntfile(java.lang.String val)
The build file to use. Defaults to "build.xml". This file is expected to be a filename relative to the dir attribute given.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.setAntfile)

setTarget

public Ant setTarget(java.lang.String val)
The target of the new Ant project to execute. Defaults to the new project's default target.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.setTarget)

setOutput

public Ant setOutput(java.lang.String val)
Set the filename to write the output to. This is relative to the value of the dir attribute if it has been set or to the base directory of the current project otherwise.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.setOutput)

public Ant addReference(org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Ant.Reference val)
Add a Reference element identifying a data type to carry over to the new project.

setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper

public Ant setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.Task.setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper)

setDescription

public Ant setDescription(java.lang.String val)
Sets a description of the current action. This may be used for logging purposes.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent.setDescription)
